ygData.subject: Re: Banded Prices
ygData.msgSnippet: ... to ... The dough recipe has not been working until just recently; it was fixed in the last patch and now functions.  Thus, bakers didn t need ceramics or
ygData.messageBody:
--- Dennis Meek <dmeek01@...> wrote:
> Pottery. Soon to be screwed, similar to brewing.
> Gnomes need pie tins I hear, but why can't they just
> learn the skill and make one? Sure, ceramic linings
> are needed, and a few others for baking. But how
> many bakers out there are rushing up to potters and
> buying up their wares? I doubt very many. I know
> for a fact I have never used my own pottery skills
to
> make a ceramic lining to use in blacksmithing. Go
> fig.

The dough recipe has not been working until just
recently; it was fixed in the last patch and now
functions. Thus, bakers didn't need ceramics or
cookware. Baking is finally being fixed, and now the
bakers need these items to bake and cook with.

===
:D
Dave's World
-No matter where you go, there you are-
"People will believe a lie either because they want to
believe it's true, or because they fear it is." Wizard's
First Rule, Sword of Truth, Terry Goodkind
